note:
Artist, writer, TTRPG content creator, occasional textile crafter and jewellery make.
Ask me about my Homebrew World - I dare you! Because I WILL talk for hours if you let me.
Will also talk for hours about Faeries, ghosts, spirits, myths, legends and fantasy.

"World of Aarde" creator
Homebrew Havoc player and creator
Voice Actress for Keeva the Half Dryad Bard and Mercy, the Crystal Tiefling Rogue
2KiaT Podcast host
Official Dice Goblin
Previously an exhibitor at the Asylum Steampunk Festival
